data.name: Strike Buster Prototype - Valen DLC
data.detailed_description:
New shock!

Hello everyone! After another two months, we can finally bring you a brand new content update!
First of all, the new character DLC debuts
This time the character DLC contains the newly designed melee character Valen Valen! She brought nine new weapons, each of which is fully compatible with the previous relic system and the red-named firearms system, and you can also rank and customize new exclusive red-named weapons in the future!
In addition, she also has a completely dynamic skin and burst clothes animation.

In addition to DLC, our game body also has a major update! And it is free to update without increasing the amount!
The first is the fully dynamic skin and burst clothes animation of the protagonist UNO

Then came the new system, the intelligence system. This system not only counts player performance, but also unlocks game character descriptions and dynamic stand-up displays:

Unlock monster description and display:

A whole new gallery system allows players to see more original designs that have not been included:

The new hands-on tutorials can be viewed at any time. If you don’t understand, just click.

New shock!

Hello everyone! After another two months, we can finally bring you a brand new content update!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E6320 (2*1866)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 7600 GS (512 MB)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 9400
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 970

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy Strike Buster Prototype - Valen DLC

subs.option_text: 强袭人形：原体 - 瓦莲扩展包 - 40₴

content_descriptors.notes:
The game contains slight nudity.

All the characters in the game are over 18 years old.
